author: President Gordon B. Hinckley
quote: The greatest work you will ever do will be within the walls of your own home.

author: President Thomas S. Monson
quote: The future is as bright as your faith.

author: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland
quote: Don’t give up. Don’t you quit. You keep walking. You keep trying.

author: President Russell M. Nelson
quote: The Lord loves you. He is with you. He will help you.

author: Elder Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quote: You are more precious than you can imagine.

author: Elder David A. Bednar
quote: We can choose to follow the Savior each day.

author: Elder Henry B. Eyring
quote: The Lord’s purposes are being accomplished, often in ways that we cannot see or understand.

author: President Gordon B. Hinckley
quote: We must make choices based on truth, rather than on popularity or comfort.

author: Elder Neil L. Andersen
quote: The Savior will lead you with love and mercy, no matter how difficult the journey.

author: Elder Ronald A. Rasband
quote: We can choose to be a light in the lives of others, no matter where we are.

author: President Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quote: You are a beloved son or daughter of God, and He has a plan for you.

author: President Thomas S. Monson
quote: We will be blessed for making the decision to serve and to live in a way that will bring blessings to others.

author: Elder M. Russell Ballard
quote: Every day is a new opportunity to draw closer to the Savior and to become more like Him.

author: President Henry B. Eyring
quote: Our Heavenly Father knows and loves you. He will help you.

author: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland
quote: When life is difficult, the Savior will be there to help you through it.

author: Elder D. Todd Christofferson
quote: The Savior’s grace can help us become more than we ever thought possible.

author: Elder James E. Faust
quote: Each of us can strive to live the gospel in a way that makes a difference in the lives of others.

author: President Russell M. Nelson
quote: We must not give up, because we are part of the Lord’s work.

author: Elder Quentin L. Cook
quote: We can find joy in the journey, even when challenges come our way.

author: Elder Richard G. Scott
quote: The Savior’s love will help you through the hardest of times.

author: Elder Bruce R. McConkie
quote: The gospel of Jesus Christ is the way, the truth, and the life.

author: Elder Marvin J. Ashton
quote: Love is the greatest force for good in this world.

author: President Boyd K. Packer
quote: True happiness comes from following the teachings of Jesus Christ.

author: Elder L. Tom Perry
quote: We must be patient in adversity, for the Lord’s timing is always perfect.

author: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland
quote: The Savior understands the pain of the world and can bring comfort to those who suffer.

author: President Gordon B. Hinckley
quote: You are never alone. The Lord is with you in all things.

author: President Thomas S. Monson
quote: God’s love is constant, no matter our circumstances.

author: Elder Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quote: Do not be afraid to try. It is in the trying that we find the strength to succeed.

author: President Russell M. Nelson
quote: Through our faith in Christ, we can find strength for every challenge.

author: Elder David A. Bednar
quote: Miracles come through simple, yet powerful acts of faith.

author: Elder Henry B. Eyring
quote: It is through the Savior’s Atonement that we find true healing.

author: Elder Neil L. Andersen
quote: In times of trial, hold on to faith and trust in God’s plan.

author: President Gordon B. Hinckley
quote: A life of service brings joy that cannot be found anywhere else.

author: President Thomas S. Monson
quote: We are all given the gift of agency to choose the right path.

author: Elder Ronald A. Rasband
quote: True peace comes from living the principles of the gospel.

author: Elder M. Russell Ballard
quote: We can each be an instrument in the hands of God to bring good to the world.

author: President Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quote: Faith and hope are the anchors of our soul in times of trial.

author: Elder D. Todd Christofferson
quote: Christ is the source of our strength, and He can help us overcome any challenge.

author: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland
quote: In our darkest moments, God is still with us, waiting to comfort us.

author: President Boyd K. Packer
quote: The joy of the gospel is found in following Christ’s example and teachings.

author: Elder Bruce R. McConkie
quote: Through the gospel of Jesus Christ, all things are made new.

author: President Gordon B. Hinckley
quote: A loving home is the foundation for a strong community.

author: Elder Quentin L. Cook
quote: It is not the trials we face, but how we respond to them that defines us.

author: Elder Richard G. Scott
quote: The love of God is the most powerful force on earth.

author: President Thomas S. Monson
quote: When we serve others, we are serving God.

author: Elder L. Tom Perry
quote: It is through our obedience that we draw closer to the Lord.

author: Elder Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quote: The best way to find happiness is by seeking to make others happy.

author: Elder David A. Bednar
quote: Our trials are part of our journey to become more like Christ.

author: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland
quote: Christ’s love is infinite and available to all who seek it.

author: President Russell M. Nelson
quote: Faith in Jesus Christ gives us power to overcome the challenges of life.

author: Elder Ronald A. Rasband
quote: Each day is a new opportunity to serve God and others.

author: President Gordon B. Hinckley
quote: Every good thing comes from God, and we should express gratitude for all He has given us.

author: Elder D. Todd Christofferson
quote: We are never too far from God’s reach to feel His love and guidance.

author: President Henry B. Eyring
quote: Hope is not wishful thinking; it is the power to move forward with faith.

author: Elder Jeffrey R. Holland
quote: Let us all strive to be the best versions of ourselves through Christ.

author: President Boyd K. Packer
quote: True happiness comes from living the commandments and following Jesus Christ.

author: President Thomas S. Monson
quote: A heart full of gratitude brings peace and joy.

author: Elder M. Russell Ballard
quote: As we follow the Savior, we are blessed with strength and peace.

author: Elder Dieter F. Uchtdorf
quote: Every challenge we face can become an opportunity for growth through Christ.

author: Elder L. Tom Perry
quote: The power of the gospel is found in the Savior’s Atonement.

author: President Gordon B. Hinckley
quote: Work hard, be kind, and seek for the happiness that comes through serving others.

author: Elder David A. Bednar
quote: God’s love is constant, and His hand is always outstretched to us.

author: Elder Neil L. Andersen
quote: The Lord’s plan for you is greater than anything you can imagine.

author: Elder Bruce R. McConkie
quote: The gospel of Jesus Christ is the answer to all the problems of the world.

author: Elder Ronald A. Rasband
quote: We must be steadfast in our devotion to the Savior and His teachings.

author: President Thomas S. Monson
quote: Be grateful for the small things, for they lead to greater blessings.

author: President Henry B. Eyring
quote: The Lord’s timing is always perfect, and He knows what we need when we need it.
